home.name: Priya Thakkar
home.description:
In past 3 years and 6 months, I have sharpened various technical and non-technical skills including direct interaction with client and external teams. I love to work on challenging projects with exposure to upcoming technologies or ripening roles towards better career. I am an effective team player with proven strength in problem analysis and solving.
Specialties: Java/J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, JSF frameworks.

education.description: I had completed my B.E. in 2014 with an aggregate of 9.37 CGPA.
I had completed my schooling in 2010, securing 90% in Higher Secondary(10+2) and 9.4 CGPA in Secondary (10th grade) examinations.

experience.description:
Currently covering all aspects of application development:
- Requirement gathering/estimations
- Designing application architecture
- Backend development & unit testing
- Deployments & server setup
Hands on experience in developing enterprise applications using design patterns and working with MVC architecture using Struts framework.

skills.description: Having hands on experience in Core Java, JDBC, JSP, Servlets, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Java Realtime tools and Design Patterns.
RESTful Web Services development using Spring framework.
Have competent proficiency with Oracle, MySQL and MongoDB databases.
Web API development using Express framework and Node.js
Integration of static HTML pages with Java Servlets/JSP.
